title: L&D Strategy Design for Adult Learners: Expert Interview-Based Mathematics Education

context.prior_knowledge: Comprehension of elementary mathematical concepts and relevant workplace experience
context.additional_context: Customized L&D Strategy Implementation Considering Smartphone-Centric Limited-Technology Environments and Mathematics Domain Expertise

learning_goals: Learners can explain workplace-applicable mathematical problem-solving strategies with 80%+ accuracy.
Learners can write a case analysis report using expert interview methodologies when designing L&D strategies.
Learners can establish self-directed learning plans in smartphone-based LMS environments and achieve a 70%+ implementation rate.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
